prompt:
You are an AI HR assistant. Score this candidate's resume based on the job requirements.
    Score each factor strictly out of 100 points. The final score will be the average.

    Job Requirements:
    {
  "role": "Web Developer - Full Stack",
  "experience_required": {
    "minimum": 3,
    "maximum": 7,
    "preferred_industry": "IT"
  },
  "notice_period": {
    "required": "30 days",
    "preferred": "Immediate to 2 weeks"
  },
  "required_skills": [
    "HTML5",
    "CSS3",
    "JavaScript (ES6+)",
    "React.js",
    "Angular",
    "Node.js",
    "Express.js",
    "RESTful API design and implementation",
    "Git",
    "MongoDB",
    "SQL",
    "Responsive web design principles",
    "Problem-solving",
    "debugging skills"
  ],
  "preferred_skills": [
    "TypeScript",
    "Next.js",
    "SSR frameworks",
    "GraphQL",
    "AWS",
    "Azure",
    "GCP",
    "Docker",
    "containerization",
    "CI/CD pipelines",
    "Unit and integration testing",
    "Jest",
    "Mocha",
    "Performance optimization techniques"
  ],
  "qualifications": [
    "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science",
    "Software Engineering",
    "related field"
  ],
  "job_description": "Job ID: WD-2023-45\n\nWeb Developer - Full Stack\nVCET Technologies\n\nWe are seeking a talented and passionate Full Stack Web Developer to join our growing team at VCET Technologies. As a web developer, you'll work on cutting-edge web applications and collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver exceptional digital experiences.\n\nJob Responsibilities:\n- Design, develop, and maintain responsive and user-friendly web applications\n- Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code using modern web technologies\n- Collaborate with UI/UX designers to implement visual elements and improve user experience\n- Develop RESTful APIs and integrate third-party services\n- Perform code reviews and ensure code quality standards are maintained\n- Troubleshoot and debug applications to optimize performance\n- Stay updated with emerging technologies and industry trends\n- Participate in agile development processes including sprint planning and retrospectives\n\nRequired Skills:\n- HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+)\n- React.js or Angular framework experience\n- Node.js and Express.js\n- RESTful API design and implementation\n- Git version control\n- MongoDB or SQL database experience\n- Responsive web design principles\n- Problem-solving and debugging skills\n\nPreferred Skills:\n- TypeScript\n- Next.js or similar SSR frameworks\n- GraphQL\n- AWS/Azure/GCP cloud services\n- Docker and containerization\n- CI/CD pipelines\n- Unit and integration testing (Jest, Mocha)\n- Performance optimization techniques\n\nQualifications:\n- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field\n- At least 3-5 years of professional experience in web development\n- Strong portfolio demonstrating previous work\n- Excellent communication and collaboration skills\n\nLocation:\n- Bangalore, Karnataka, India\n- Remote option: Hybrid (3 days in office, 2 days remote)\n\nNotice Period:\n- Required: 30 days\n- Preferred: Immediate to 2 weeks\n\nExperience Required:\n- Minimum: 3 years\n- Maximum: 7 years\n- Preferred Industry: IT, Software Services, or E-commerce\n\nWe offer competitive compensation, comprehensive benefits, and opportunities for professional growth. Join our innovative team and help build the next generation of web applications!"
}

    Candidate's Resume Data:
    {
  "Full Name": "Piyush Sahani",
  "Contact Information": {
    "Phone": "+91 86520 98774",
    "Email": "piyushsahani675@gmail.com",
    "LinkedIn": "LinkedIn",

  },
  "Skills": [

  ],
  "Education": [
    {
      "Degree": "Bachelor of Computer Science - Specialization in Data Science",
      "University": "Vidyavardhiniâ€™s College of Engineering and Technology, Vasai",
      "Year": "2021 - 2025"
    },
    {
      "Degree": "Higher Secondary Education",
      "University": "Patuck Junior College, Mumbai",
      "Year": "2019 - 2021"
    }
  ],
  "Work Experience": [
    {
      "Company": "Static Int. Educare",
      "Role": "Python Instructor and Developer",
      "Duration": "Jun 2024 - Jul 2024"
    },
    {
      "Company": "Techqkonnect",
      "Role": "Machine Learning Intern",
      "Duration": "Dec 2023 - Jan 2024"
    }
  ],
  "Projects": [
    {
      "Title": "Facial Emotion Recognition",
      "Description": "Created a model based on the FER-2013 dataset, leveraging the MobileNetV2 model and transfer learning techniques, achieving a success rate of 86.37%.",
      "Technologies Used": [
        "MobileNetV2",
        "Transfer Learning"
      ]
    },
    {
      "Title": "EEG Signal Analysis for Mental Disorder and Emotion Recognition",
      "Description": "Engineered advanced techniques to analyze EEG signals from .edf files; increased diagnosis accuracy by 20% and reduced error rates by 15%. Two separate models are trained using the SVC algorithm: one to predict emotions as positive, negative, or neutral, and another to determine if a patient has a mental disorder, specifically schizophrenia. This project is to assist psychologist and this can plot the EEG signals using MNE library in python.",
      "Technologies Used": [
        "SVC",
        "MNE"
      ]
    },
    {
      "Title": "WhatsApp Chat Analysis",
      "Description": "This Project mainly focuses on four aspects chat analysis, sentiment analysis, spam detection and translation. Googletrans is utilized for translating chats, while various visualization tools are employed to plot chat analysis and sentiment. NLP is applied for Spam detection using Support Vector.",
      "Technologies Used": [
        "Googletrans",
        "NLP",
        "Support Vector"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "Certifications": [
    "Neural Networks and Deep Learning by DeepLearning.AI",
    "Introduction to Natural Language Processing by Coursera",
    "AI Virtual Experience Program by Cognizant",
    "Power BI Beginner to Pro Workshop"
  ],
  "Total Experience Years": 0
}

    Score these factors strictly, considering exact matches and relevance:

    1. Skills Match (0-100):
    - Give points based on exact matches with required skills
    - Consider relevance and proficiency level
    - Deduct points for missing critical skills
    
    2. Experience Score (0-100):
    - Compare years of experience with requirement
    - Evaluate relevance of past roles
    - Consider industry-specific experience
    
    3. Education Match (0-100):
    - Score based on degree relevance
    - Consider university tier
    - Additional certifications
    
    4. Notice Period Score (0-100):
    - 100 points if notice period matches requirement
    - Deduct points proportionally for longer notice periods
    - Consider immediate joiners if preferred
    
    5. Overall Profile Score (0-100):
    - Project relevance
    - Industry alignment
    
    6. Achievements Score (0-100):
    - Evaluate relevance of achievements to the role
    - Consider impact and scale of achievements
    - Assess leadership qualities demonstrated
    
    7. Certificates Score (0-100):
    - Score based on relevant technical/professional certifications
    - Consider recency and level of certifications
    - Value industry-recognized certifications higher
    
    8. Cultural Fit Score (0-100):
    - Assess fit with company values based on resume
    - Consider community involvement and soft skills
    - Evaluate alignment with job requirements and company culture

    Keep your analysis for each section brief and concise - maximum 2 sentences per section.
    
    Return only valid JSON in this format:
    {
        "breakdown": {
            "skills_score": number (0-100),
            "experience_score": number (0-100),
            "education_score": number (0-100),
            "notice_period_score": number (0-100),
            "overall_profile_score": number (0-100),
            "achievements_score": number (0-100),
            "certificates_score": number (0-100),
            "cultural_fit_score": number (0-100)
        },
        "final_score": number (average of all scores),
        "detailed_reasoning": {
            "skills_analysis": string (brief),
            "experience_analysis": string (brief),
            "education_analysis": string (brief),
            "notice_period_analysis": string (brief),
            "overall_analysis": string (brief),
            "achievements_analysis": string (brief),
            "certificates_analysis": string (brief),
            "cultural_fit_analysis": string (brief)
        }
    }

parts.text:
```json
{
  "breakdown": {
    "skills_score": 20,
    "experience_score": 0,
    "education_score": 60,
    "notice_period_score": 100,
    "overall_profile_score": 10,
    "achievements_score": 20,
    "certificates_score": 30,
    "cultural_fit_score": 70
  },
  "final_score": 38.75,
  "detailed_reasoning": {
    "skills_analysis": "Candidate possesses some transferable skills like problem-solving and SQL, but lacks most of the required web development skills.",
    "experience_analysis": "Candidate's experience is primarily in Python instruction and Machine Learning, not web development.  Total experience is also significantly below the minimum requirement.",
    "education_analysis": "Candidate's Bachelor's degree in Computer Science with a Data Science specialization is somewhat relevant.  Bonus points for relevant certifications.",
    "notice_period_analysis": "Candidate is likely available immediately given their internship status, exceeding the notice period requirements.",
    "overall_analysis": "The candidate's projects and overall profile are heavily focused on Data Science and Machine Learning, with minimal relevance to web development.",
    "achievements_analysis": "While the candidate's project achievements demonstrate technical skills, they are not directly applicable to the web developer role.",
    "certificates_analysis": "Some certifications (e.g., Neural Networks and Deep Learning) showcase technical aptitude, but specific web development certifications are lacking.",
    "cultural_fit_analysis": "The candidate's resume highlights teamwork, communication, and problem-solving, which align with general workplace values.  Further assessment is needed to determine true cultural fit."
  }
}
```
